title: Man Tipping Hand

Not showing due respect; impertinent; bold-faced.

description:
A man tipping his hand by his shoulder as if he’s carrying a tray of drinks or flipping his hair.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.
apple_vendor_description: The man tipping hand emoji on Apple devices presents a dapper gentleman with a single hand elegantly tilted, conveying a sense of suave charm and polite acknowledgment.  Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the hand a polished, almost liquid appearance, with subtle highlights that enhance its tactile quality.  This emoji is often used to express a stylish 'thank you,' a gentle greeting, or a subtle wave, embodying sophisticated grace in digital interactions on Apple devices.
